on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Google Cloud SDK
        uses: google-github-actions/setup-gcloud@v1
        with:
          service_account_key: ${{ secrets.GCP_SA_KEY }}
          project_id: ${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}
          export_default_credentials: true

      - name: Authenticate to Google Cloud
        run: |
          gcloud auth configure-docker europe-west3-docker.pkg.dev --quiet
          gcloud auth configure-docker # for docker authentication

      - name: Docker Auth
        run: |
          gcloud auth print-access-token | docker login -u oauth2accesstoken --password-stdin europe-west3-docker.pkg.dev

      - name: Build and push Docker image
        run: |
          docker build -t europe-west3-docker.pkg.dev/${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}/ravi-mcp-server-repo/ravi-mcp-server:latest .
          docker push europe-west3-docker.pkg.dev/${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}/ravi-mcp-server-repo/ravi-mcp-server:latest

      - name: Deploy to Cloud Run
        run: |
          gcloud run deploy ravi-mcp-server \
            --image europe-west3-docker.pkg.dev/${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}/ravi-mcp-server-repo/ravi-mcp-server:latest \
            --platform managed \
            --region europe-west3 \
            --set-env-vars "MICROSERVICE_URL=${{ secrets.MICROSERVICE_URL }}" \
            --no-allow-unauthenticated \
            --service-account github-deployer@${{ secrets.GCP_PROJECT_ID }}.iam.gserviceaccount.com
